component.name: UpToDate
component.summary: Keep your system packages up to date

description.p: UpToDate is a modern system update manager that helps you keep all your packages up to date across multiple package managers.

ul.li: Support for multiple package managers (pacman, apt, dnf, flatpak, snap, pip, npm, rustup, and more)
Dry-run mode to preview updates before applying them
Clean, modern interface following GNOME Human Interface Guidelines
Real-time progress tracking for each package manager

screenshot.caption: Main window showing available package managers

description.p: Initial alpha release with core functionality
